topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551213416368722c0a330700#post_551213416368722c0a330700
[bq="igotnopicks"]"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551212cd63687214126e0200#post_551212cd63687214126e0200
Parents do that.[/bq]
No, my parents aren't flipping their sh!t surprisingly (but give them time), although my low grade has started shooting back up around the 50%s (not enough still but it's a start)

Meanwhile my 160% is... still a 160%

"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55121ac36368724e284a1700#post_55121ac36368724e284a1700
[bq="HJSDGCE"]I should really eat some breakfast...

Also, does anyone here have a girlfriend/boyfriend?[/bq]
Ha, that's rich.

First of all, no girl would ever want to date a guy that likes neither chocolate nor pizza. Second, I don't want children, so there's that obstacle. Third, I haven't found anyone who clicks with me so far (mainly due to lack of action on my part but nevertheless I haven't met many girls whose personality draws me in yet). Fourth, any girls I've ever been remotely interested in were in a relationship at the time of me being interested in them. Fifth, if all of that previous stuff I mentioned happens to turn out in my favor, they're people who are either A) out of my age group, meaning it would be weird to date someone years older/younger than me at my age, or B) in another part of the world entirely, extremely limiting my ability to pursue any feelings I have for them.

So yeah, all in all, I'm a fcuking loner, and it'll likely stay that way. Good news, I've already accepted that, so it's fine by me.
!http://i.imgur.com/hcnY8dF.gif!
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
I may not be a fan of the Jewelpet franchise anymore, But I decided to check on the state of the franchise since I got reminded of it.

I believe Lady Jewelpet was successful, And Jewelpet Magical change is going to come out in a few weeks.

Basically the Jewelland castle just Crashes into the Human world due to people no longer believing in Magic, And the Jewelpets have to take human form in order to get people to believe in magic again.
